main event: A witness observed a green oval-shaped object that left a vapor trail, seen for three seconds on 26 November 1956 in Oklahoma City.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a basketball at arm's length., The sighting lasted only three seconds., The object left a vapor trail that was 25 feet long., The witness noted the object was in a straight flight path before disappearing behind an obstacle., The report concludes that the sighting was caused by a meteor.
sighted object: green oval-shaped object leaving a vapor trail
witness description: Robert Werman, A/3C HQ SQ 33D ADIV DEF AIR DEFENSE CONTROL CENTER
